##Airline costs by year data was summarized by averaging costs by years and plotting them using ggplot2.

###Steps

####CSV file was imported using readr()
####One colmun name had to be changed.
####Then the d.f1 data table was created by aggregate(cost~year,Airline,mean)
####Next ggplot was used to visualize this summary.
####The plot can be viewed using the link below.
####http://rpubs.com/tekincea/arln
